item.title: How to fix Jenkins build issues related to Git connectivity
item.description: Symptoms: build fails cannot checkout / connect to GIT Validate this is the case ssh to jenkins2 assume identity of jenkins user (VERY IMPORTANT) go to /home/projects/workspace/PROJECTNAME directory This directory is repository clone. Try ‘git status’ in that directory. If you see something like 1 2 -bash-3.2$ git status fatal: unable to read tree 2d0456480112e9f9a8508bb47dc3863112cc6253 the git repo is corrupted and needs to be reloaded.
